ReferenceDocuments.name: MIREFID
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. May be used to create RELREC to link this record with a record in another domain.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This can be used to confirm that the appropriate data record is present in the electronic transfer. May be included for linking back to specimens (e.g., Specimen ID).
